Title: The Power of Your Words to Shape Outcomes
Description:
Most leaders are unaware of the power of their own words. In this episode, Michael and Megan reveal how the words you speak actually reprogram your own thinking. You'll learn how to shape your success by taking control of your thought life.

For more information, visit leadto.win.

Presented by LeaderBox.
